title: Optimizing Online Science Education: Asynchronous and Synchronous Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced knowledge and practical experience in the sciences
context.additional_context: Current practitioners have learning needs during weekends/evenings, with access to VR simulation equipment and digital device-supported environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the strengths and weaknesses of online education methods and design learning strategies suited to their work environment
A hybrid education scenario combining asynchronous and synchronous learning elements can be implemented in VR environments
The impact of learning preference styles on educational effectiveness can be quantitatively evaluated through simulation-based projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
